segments.advisor_message: Let's talk about your retirement aspirations. What do you envision for yourself during that time?
segments.client_message: Oh, well, um, I've always thought about maybe traveling a lot, you know? Like, visit places I've never been. I mean, there's just so much I wanna see. My friends always tell me to go to Europe, and, uh, my cousin, he went to Italy and said it was amazing. So yeah, travel for sure.

segments.advisor_message: That sounds wonderful! Do you have any specific destinations in mind?
segments.client_message: For sure! I mean, besides Italy, there's like, Japan, and, um, I also really wanna do a road trip across the US. There's this national park, I forgot the name, but, it's supposed to be really pretty, and my parents always took me camping there when I was a kid. Those are the kind of things that make me feel alive, you know?

segments.advisor_message: Absolutely, those experiences can be really fulfilling. Have you thought about how your finances will support such plans?
segments.client_message: Yeah, um, I’ve tried to save up some, like, I shouldn’t say much, but I think I’d need, um, maybe around a hundred thousand? That seems like a good start, right? I just want to make sure I can do everything I dream about without worrying too much about money.
